Question: Ambeent CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ambeent

CES 2024

- Ambeent is showcasing its latest smart home technology at CES 2024
- The product features advanced AI algorithms for energy efficiency and security
- It offers seamless integration with smart devices and voice assistants
- The system provides real-time monitoring and control of home appliances and security systems
- Ambeent CES 2024 aims to provide a comprehensive smart home solution for modern households.
